fields.name: marketplaceAuthority
docs: Pubkey of the marketplace authority's wallet

fields.name: seller
docs: Seller of the NFT

fields.name: mint
docs: Mint account of the NFT

fields.name: bidMint
docs: Mint account of the bid token (e.g. FOXY)

fields.name: startTime
docs: Start time as unix timestamp

fields.name: endTime
docs: End time as unix timestamp

fields.name: highestBidAmount
docs: The current highest bid amount

fields.name: highestBidder
docs: The current highest bidder or default pubkey if no bids have been made

fields.name: reservePrice
docs: The minimum bid price

fields.name: duration
docs: The duration of auction in seconds. It is used to determine the end time
of reserve price auctions when the first bid is made.

fields.name: minBidIncrementBps
docs: The minimum increase basis points in bid price from the previous bid

fields.name: timeExtPeriod
docs: Time in seconds before the end time where an extension will be made when bidding

fields.name: timeExtDelta
docs: Time in seconds to increase the end time by when an extension is made

fields.name: feeAccount
docs: Account to receive fees determined by the fee config

fields.name: feeBps
docs: The resolved fee_bps for this auction based on user/nft status at time of creating auction

fields.name: pausedAt
docs: The timestamp of when the auction was paused, or 0 if not paused

fields.name: burnOnComplete
docs: True if the mint should be burned when the auction ends (DRiP Ultimate auctions)

fields.name: buyerAck
docs: True if the buyer has acknowledged winning a burn_on_complete auction

fields.name: sellerAck
docs: True if the seller has acknowledged sale of a burn_on_complete auction

fields.name: marketplaceAuthority
docs: Pubkey of the marketplace authority's wallet.

fields.name: feeConfig
docs: Fee information for the marketplace.

fields.name: rewardsConfig
docs: Rewards config to use for user rewards

errors.name: BumpSeedNotInHashMap
errors.msg: Bump seed not in hash map

errors.name: InvalidAuctionConfigBidTokenAccount
errors.msg: Invalid auction config bid token account
